1370: Gerart moved to Goetscalcstraet.B.0 after marriage.
Got married to Pietersen at age 32 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Pietersen, Gisele, at age 32.
1371: Had a daughter with Pietersen, Gerburgis, at age 33.
1372: Had a daughter with Pietersen, Waldrada, at age 34.
1374: Had a daughter with Pietersen, Salome, at age 36.
1375: Had a daughter with Pietersen, Oderada, at age 37.
1377: Had a daughter with Pietersen, Wijfgode, at age 39.
1379: Had a daughter with Pietersen, Sybillia, at age 41.
1381: Lost daughter Sybillia when Sybillia was 3 years old.
1382: Had a son with Pietersen, Reinardus, at age 44.
